original_text: He that by usury and unjust gain increaseth his substance, he shall gather it for him that will pity the poor.
korean_text: 중한 변리로 자기 재산을 늘이는 것은 가난한 사람을 불쌍히 여기는 자를 위해 그 재산을 저축하는 것이니라

sentences.original_text: He that by usury and unjust gain
for him that will pity the poor.
sentences.korean_translation: 가난한 자를 불쌍히 여기는 자를 위해
